title: Obtain the Sinner
text: I'd rather chat with you in the cemetery than in the interrogation room... you lie inside while I sit outside. I think our chat will be much better that way.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Shhh... I hear their whispers.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Want to join... our tea party?

title: Level Start
text: Did you hear the bell tolling? The ceremony is about to begin.

title: Win Battles
text: Don't worry, the elegy is already playing.

title: Lose Battles
text: It's okay, it's not time for eternal sleep yet.

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Rest for eternity!

title: Die in Battles
text: Everyone... eventually ends up in an oaken casket...

title: Greeting
text: Hello Chief. Let us both celebrate and mourn the fact that we are still alive today.

title: Conversation 1
text: If you need a band... go find a musician named Dudu. Mention my name and maybe she'll give you a discount.

title: Conversation 2
text: Syndicate needed a grand farewell to usher in another perfect rebirth.

title: Conversation 3
text: Rest beneath the ground, glide with the wind, or drift along the tide? It doesn't really matter, my friend. They are just one necessary step to salvation.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Those who're inside caskets do not pine for the weeping of mourners. Their tears will only wash away the last of their traces and drown out their cries.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Only when there is an eternity of silence, the stupidity, boredom, and vileness of life will be changed into something intriguing... However, there is something different about you.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I cannot personally preside over my own funeral, but I will leave you my last word. Will you accept it?

title: Full Compliance
text: You intrigue me more than the dead. Please forgive me for burdening you with my darkness, loneliness, and desperation... Even upon death, I will stay by your side.

title: Idle
text: Pray? I don't do such... useless things.

title: Annoyed
text: Do you like me this much? Too bad I can't blow fragile bubbles inside my skull.

title: Special Attention
text: What do you see through my eyes?

title: Dispatch
text: Want to go for a walk in the cemetery with me?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Hmm, yes... I heard a lot of little secrets.

title: Level Up
text: I can tell that you really need me.

title: Join Team
text: Got to face that boring, breathing bunch again.

title: Head Pat
text: Skulls typically hold the most information because human brains tend to think about their unsettled business upon death.

title: Attire Obtained
text: Since the moment you stepped into the forest, you've belonged to me. I shall grant you eternal slumber. As for me, I will get everything I want.

title: Greeting
text: Good, come and eat the fruit I offer you... You'll receive the sweetest salvation.

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Someone once presented me with a magic mirror that speaks only the truth. Guess whose existence I discovered from its mouth?

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: I'm not the ruler of this place. I simply provide lost travelers with a place to rest forever.

title: Ordinary Contact 3
text: Snow covers tracks, apples arouse desires, and ebony safeguards secrets... What do you wish to decorate your resting place with?

title: Ordinary Contact 4
text: Close your eyes, and you shall see the boundless darkness of the forbidden forest... But fear not. Give me your hand, and I shall take you to where you ought to be.

title: Idle
text: This forest is not silent. After all, they have been talking to me from six feet under.

title: Level Up
text: I shall give you riper fruit.

title: Head Pat (touch head)
text: The rainbow has seven colors, and God created the world in seven days. The seven gems on my crown allow me to hear discarnate whispers. If that's also what you want... come and try to snatch my crown.

title: Special Attention
text: Since you're so curious about me... stay and become part of my collection.
